de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.markers

Class StickMarker

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.markers.Marker
      • de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.markers.StickMarker

  • public class StickMarker
extends Marker
    A marker shaped a bit like a fat cricket pole. Or a vertical price sticker. Or something such, anyway. It's a pointy stick, stuck on the ground, with a vertical text area and a colred sticker on top.
    Author:
    Miquel Martin

      Fields

      The stick's default color.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StickMarker

        public StickMarker(Trackable t)
        Create a Stick Marker taking the trackable name as caption, the default color DEFAULT_COLOR as stick color and TOP_DEFAULT_COLOR as the top color.
        Parameters:
        t - the trackable on which to put the marker

      • StickMarker

        public StickMarker(Trackable t,
           String topColorString)
        Create a Stick Marker taking the trackable name as caption, and the default color DEFAULT_COLOR as stick color.
        Parameters:
        t - the trackable on which to put the marker
        topColorString - the string for the color on the top of the stick (e.g. #00CC00)
        Throws:
        InvalidColorException - if the color string is misformated

      • StickMarker

        public StickMarker(Trackable t,
           String colorString,
           String topColorString)
        Create a Stick Marker taking the trackable name as caption.
        Parameters:
        t - the trackable on which to put the marker
        colorString - a String representing the color of the stick (e.g. #CC0000)
        topColorString - the string for the color on the top of the stick (e.g. #00CC00)
        Throws:
        InvalidColorException - if the color string is misformated

      • StickMarker

        public StickMarker(Trackable t,
           String colorString,
           String topColorString,
           String caption)
        Create a Stick Marker. Stick Markers look like like a point stick stuck on the ground. The top of the stick has a characteristic color, and the text is displayed vertically along it.
        Parameters:
        t - the trackable on which to put the marker
        colorString - a String representing the color of the stick (e.g. #CC0000)
        topColorString - the string for the color on the top of the stick (e.g. #00CC00)
        caption - the text to show on the stick
        Throws:
        InvalidColorException - if the color string is misformated
